text: Digau Judah ala e mouli hua igolo gaa noho i hongo godou henua. Digaula ga haangai nadau siibi i golo, mo di kii i lodo nia hale digau Ashkelon. Yihowah, di nadau God, gaa noho i baahi digaula, gaa hai digaula gi maluagina labelaa.2.7 Isaiah 14.29-31; Jeremiah 47.1-7; Ezekiel 25.15-17; Joel 3.4-8; Amos 1.6-8; Zechariah 9.5-7
